home_title: Zamura izina ryawe ukoresheje urubuga rwa 7,000 FRW gusa
name: Izina
success_message: ✅ Ubutumwa bwawe bwakiriwe neza. Turagusaba gutegereza igisubizo kuri imeyili cyangwa nimero witanze.
what_is_bonusAfrica: BonusAfrica igufasha kugaragara kuri interineti ku giciro gito, ukoresheje ibisubizo bigezweho kandi byihuse.
Description: BonusAfrica ni sosiyete ya tekinoloji yo muri Afurika igamije kugeza ikoranabuhanga ku bantu bose.Twemera ko ikoranabuhanga rifite uruhare rwiza mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
